summary: Photography Guides Integration - All tests PASSED. Backend API returns guides correctly for auto_vehicles category. Frontend usePhotographyGuides hook fetches and displays admin-managed guides on the post listing form. All 4 guides (Exterior Shots, Dashboard & Mileage, Engine Bay, Any Damage) display correctly with icon, title, and description.

issues: Minor: MUI Grid deprecated props warnings (item, xs, sm, md) in admin dashboard - should migrate to Grid v2

seed_data_creation: 36 default photography guides already seeded across 9 categories (from previous iteration 108)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Photography guides integration fully tested and verified. The usePhotographyGuides hook in /app/frontend/src/hooks/usePhotographyGuides.ts fetches guides from /api/photography-guides/public/{category_id}. The post listing form (/app/frontend/app/post/index.tsx) displays these guides in Step 2 (Photos) under 'Tips for Great Photos' section. Each guide shows icon, title, and description. Falls back to static tips if API fails.

backend_public_api.details: GET /api/photography-guides/public/{category_id} returns guides with correct structure (id, title, description, icon, category_id, order)

hook_fetches_guides.details: usePhotographyGuides hook fetches guides from API when category is selected. Tested with auto_vehicles - returns 4 guides

post_listing_page_loads.details: Post listing page loads with 6-step wizard: Category, Photos, Details, Attributes, Price, Review

category_selection_works.details: Auto & Vehicles category can be selected along with Cars subcategory

photo_tips_display.details: After selecting auto_vehicles category and proceeding to Photos step, 'Tips for Great Photos' section displays all 4 admin-managed guides

guide_structure_correct.details: Each guide displays: icon (green Ionicon), title (bold text), description (gray text). Verified: Exterior Shots, Dashboard & Mileage, Engine Bay, Any Damage
